articles.title: Malaysia will require trade permits for U.S. AI chips
articles.description: Malaysia is introducing new export restrictions on U.S. AI chips in an attempt to prevent these chips from being smuggled into China.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.description: Google is adding notebooks from various authors, publications, researchers, and nonprofits to its popular AI-powered research and note-taking
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.author: Maxwell Zeff

articles.title: Weekly subscriptions dominate iOS app revenue, report finds
articles.description: Weekly subscriptions have now become one of the most popular ways iOS apps are earning revenue, with these plans contributing 46% to the bottom line,

articles.title: GM to challenge China’s LFP monopoly with upgraded battery factory
articles.description: The factory’s overhaul will give U.S. LFP production a significant boost.

articles.title: Rainmaker partners with Atmo to squeeze more rain from clouds
articles.description: Atmo will use its deep learning models to help Rainmaker identify clouds that have potential for seeding.

articles.title: Rivian CEO RJ Scaringe’s voting control slips following divorce settlement
articles.description: Rivian founder and CEO RJ Scaringe has transferred a portion of his ownership stake and voting power as part of a newly settled divorce proceeding.

articles.title: Elmo’s X account hacked to publish racist and antisemitic posts
articles.description: A hacker compromised Elmo's X account on Sunday and published abusive posts.

articles.title: Discord’s virtual reward, ‘Orbs,’ launches out of beta
articles.description: According to Discord, Orbs have been popular among testers, with millions earned and spent during the seven-week beta period.

articles.title: Jack Dorsey’s latest app tracks sun exposure
articles.description: Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey's new app, called Sun Day, ostensibly helps users track UV exposure and vitamin D intake.
